discovered.description:
Has this location been discovered by the player.
If false, the connected locations will be hidden.

connectedLocations.description: The locations connected to this one

maxTeamSize.description: The max number of characters in a team

isComputingNextTick.description:
Is the next tick being computed.
In that case NextTickDate refers to the old tick's next tick date, which means that it is probably in the past.

lastTickDate.description: If the game is started, the date at which last tick has been computed

nextTickDate.description: If the game is not paused, the date at which next tick will be computed

harvests.description: The harvests available on the entity

expectedHarvest.description: The expected result of the harvest

expectedExperience.description: The expected experience gain from the harvest

item.description: The item instance representing this stack

count.description: The number of instances in this stack

currentInteraction.description: The interaction being performed by the character

plannedAction.description: The action that the character has planned for the next tick

nextLevelExperience.description: The experience required to reach next level. The value is null when Level is the max level.

weight.description: The total weight of the items in the inventory
